title: The Dispersal of seeds and fruits
brief_description: Considers the origin of seeds and fruits and discusses the need to spread these structures in order to avoid excessive competition, and to spread the species. Illustrates the agencies for dispersal - wind, animal and less common, water.
description: Considers the origin of seeds and fruits and discusses the need to spread these structures in order to avoid excessive competition, and to spread the species. Illustrates the agencies for dispersal - wind, animal and less common, water.
